refnamediv.refpurpose: Compute linear model using Steiglitz-McBride iteration

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [b,a] = stmcb(h,nb,na) [b,a] = stmcb(y,x,nb,na) [b,a] = stmcb(h,nb,na,niter) [b,a] = stmcb(y,x,nb,na,niter) [b,a] = stmcb(h,nb,na,niter,ai) [b,a] = stmcb(y,x,nb,na,niter,ai)

listitem.para: : coefficients of the system function,nb is number of zeros and na is number of poles
: input and output of same length given to the system
: initial estimate of the denominator coefficients

variablelist.para: Accepts only real i/ps, complex i/ps are not accepted due to limitations of the 'filter' function in Scilab

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: h = fscanfMat("macros/stmcb_h_data.txt"); //required impulse response samples plot(h); //plotting required impulse response title "Required impulse respose (h) plot " xlabel "samples (n)" ylabel "magnitude {h(n)} " nb = 4 ; // four zeros na = 4 ; //four poles stmcb(h,nb,na)
